description: Chelsea forward Lauren James was your player of the match as England cruised into the last 16 of the Women's World Cup.
title: China v England player ratings: Lauren James your player of the match in Group D game
title_page: China v England player ratings: Lauren James your player of the match in Group D game - BBC Sport
maintext:
Lauren James was your player of the match as England cruised into the last 16 of the Women's World Cup with a thumping 6-1 win against China.
Chelsea forward James was the top choice of BBC Sport readers for the second game in succession, with a rating of 8.57.
The 21-year-old scored twice, had another strike ruled out and provided three assists to set up a last-16 tie with Nigeria on BBC One on Monday.
Fellow scorers Alessia Russo and Lauren Hemp were also highly rated, finishing on 7.76 and 7.72 respectively.
Check out each player's rating, chosen by you, below.
